actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the San Jose Invitational Track and Field Meet is recognized as a contribution to the nationwide program of physical fitness.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the San Jose Invitational Track and Field Meet is recognized as a contribution to the nationwide program of physical fitness.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the San Jose Invitational Track and Field Meet is recognized as a contribution to the nationwide program of physical fitness.
